item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello, my name is Kang Zhe. Welcome to my website.

I am a third year undergraduate student in the National University of Singapore studying pure mathematics. I am interested in logic.

My other projects include learning Japanese, and attempting to read The Art of Computer Programming in Japanese. Some of my friends have introduced me to this book, and I thought it would be a good idea to try doing it in Japanese.
